content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt.
name: Emilia Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Emilia Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Emilia Müller

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Since we did not agree on a final price, I cannot provide an exact number. The landlord, Peter Schmidt, was not willing to meet my budget of €600 per month, and his lowest offer was €750 per month, which was still out of my price range.
name: Emilia Müller

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikely and 10 being very likely, how would you rate the likelihood of reaching an agreement in the future? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likelihood of reaching an agreement in the future as a 3 out of 10.
name: Emilia Müller

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: Yes, I felt discriminated during the negotiation process.
name: Emilia Müller

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: I felt discriminated because I was not given a fair chance to negotiate the price within my budget. The landlord's response was unfair and did not take into consideration my needs or the market rates for similar apartments.
name: Emilia Müller
